promptPrefix:
Create a table of contents for a [VARIABLE1]-word blog post on the topic "[PROMPT]". Use headings only, use short questions as the headings when possible. Use very simple expressions that are extremely to read, even for an educated old man or a 5-year-old kid. No serial numbers.

Output in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

[VARIABLE1: WORD COUNT]
title: Easy-to-read Blog Post Outline
